evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: Proof of my profession. The first and last time I used it was a year ago.

evidences.name: Doug's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Date and time of death: 4/9 at 3 PM. Cause of death was a fatal electric shock.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 1
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: The crime took place behind an Ivy U. building. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: The victim's watch stopped at the time of death. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Coldkiller X
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: Found clutched in the victim's hand. Covered in Wright's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Umbrella
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: Owned by the victim. Found broken near an electrical pole at the crime scene.

evidences.name: Phoenix's Testimony
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: The victim fell on top of his umbrella. There was a loud sound when this happened.

evidences.name: Dahlia's Present
evidences.description1: A small bottle necklace given to Wright on the day they met. He shows it to everyone.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping
evidences.description1: An article from 8/28, almost 8 months ago. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Student's Testimony
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: The old power cable broke due to some sort of impact on 4/9 at 2:55 PM.

evidences.name: Police Report
evidences.description1: A report on the incident eight months ago. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.

evidences.name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
evidences.description1: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito.
evidences.description2: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime.
evidences.description3: Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.

evidences.name: Sacred Urn
evidences.obtained: Received from Maya Fey.  → Submitted as evidence by Desirée DeLite.
evidences.description1: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot.
evidences.description2: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value.
evidences.description3: Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it.
evidences.description4: Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article.
evidences.description5: Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.

evidences.name: DeMasque's Calling Card
evidences.description1: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Shichishito
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime.
evidences.description2: DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.

evidences.name: Camera Data
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.

evidences.name: Desirée's Letter
evidences.description1: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.

evidences.name: Security Camera Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Blackmail Letter
evidences.description1: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. Click here to read.
evidences.description2: Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.

evidences.name: Ron's Wallet
evidences.description1: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).

evidences.name: Key Card → CEO Office Key Card
evidences.description1: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job.
evidences.description2: Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used.
evidences.description3: Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.

evidences.name: Publicity Photo
evidences.description1: A shot of Mask☆DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.

evidences.name: DeMasque's Broach
evidences.description1: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.

evidences.name: Kane's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping
evidences.description1: An article on Mask☆DeMasque's first heist. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.

evidences.name: CEO Office Buzzer
evidences.obtained: Found in the KB Security CEO's Office.
evidences.description1: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.

evidences.name: Kane's List
evidences.obtained: Found in the KB Security CEO's Office.
evidences.description1: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Buzzer Record
evidences.description1: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.

evidences.name: Ron's Testimony
evidences.description1: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.

evidences.name: Urn Box
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.

evidences.name: Paint Marks
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly.
evidences.description2: When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.obtained: Received from Maya Fey.  → Found in the Kitchen.
evidences.description1: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.
evidences.description2: On loan from Maya. Recovered in the kitchen of Trés Bien.

evidences.name: Magazine Clipping
evidences.description1: An article from December 5th. Says I was trounced and my client was found guilty.

evidences.name: Sports Paper
evidences.description1: Dates from December 3rd, the day of the incident. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Left by a costumer in Trés Bien on Dec. 3rd. Click here for details.
evidences.description3: Left by the victim. Doodle is in victim's handwriting. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Job Listings
evidences.description1: Picked up from a bench in Vitamin Square. Thrown away by the old man.

evidences.name: Lunch Special
evidences.description1: Trés Bien lunch special. Costs 20 dollars despite how unbelievably bad it tastes.

evidences.name: Small Bottle
evidences.description1: Found in the kitchen. Shape is different from the others bottles. Contents unknown.
evidences.description2: The victim's ear medicine. Found covered in unidentified fingerprints in the kitchen.
evidences.description3: The victim's ear medicine. Covered in Furio Tigre's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Scooter
evidences.description1: Ridden by my phony. The wheel guard is all smashed up.

evidences.name: Jean's Loan Contract
evidences.description1: Jean's debt is half a million dollars. The owner of the loan is Tender Lender.

evidences.name: Victor's Note
evidences.description1: "Convicted before, a wicked man or woman, repeat offender -- Victor Kudo"

evidences.name: Glen's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Died of potassium cyanide poisoning. Time of death was between 1:30 and 2:30 PM.

evidences.name: Trés Bien Floor Plans
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Blueprints of the crime scene. Click here for details. X = victim's seat.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: A photo of the scene taken from near the kitchen. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Coffee Cup
evidences.description1: The coffee contained potassium cyanide. Covered in the victim and Maggey's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Victim's Lottery Ticket
evidences.description1: A winning ticket for half a million dollars. Found during a body search of Maggey.

evidences.name: Apron
evidences.description1: Worn by Maggey at the time of the incident. Has small pockets but big stains.

evidences.name: Potassium Cyanide
evidences.description1: A deadly powdery poison. Bears Maggey's fingerprints. Found in her apron pocket.

evidences.name: Victim's Prescription Bag
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: The victim got this from the doctor before going to Trés Bien. The bag is empty.

evidences.name: Victor's Testimony
evidences.description1: "When the incident occurred, I broke the vase at my seat. I'm sorry."

evidences.name: Millionaire Radio Flyer
evidences.description1: Experience the most thrilling ten minutes of your life every Monday at 1:30 PM!

evidences.name: Glen's Calendar
evidences.description1: On Dec. 3rd, the day of the incident, there is a note saying, "Meet with The Tiger".

evidences.name: Losing Horse Racing Tickets
evidences.description1: Horse racing betting tickets. Found in Glen Elg's desk. There's over 500 of them!

evidences.name: Gumshoe's Lunchbox
evidences.description1: A tenderly handmade lunchbox. Fills the stomach with love and plenty of weenies.

evidences.name: MC Bomber
evidences.description1: Found at Tender Lender. A sample disc with the name written in marker.
evidences.description2: Found at Tender Lender. Contains a computer virus program.
evidences.description3: A computer virus made by Glen Elg. Potentially worth million of dollars.

evidences.name: Trés Bien Matches
evidences.description1: Matches used for advertising. Found lying in Tender Lender.

evidences.name: Repair Bill
evidences.description1: A car repair bill for $15,000. Paid by Tigre to the Cadaverini Family.

evidences.name: Paper Badge
evidences.description1: Found at Tender Lender. Made of cardboard and painted to look authentic.

evidences.name: Viola's Medical Papers
evidences.description1: A 1 million dollar bill for cranial surgery. Payment was due last year.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: Proof of my profession. It's brand-new and sparkles in the light.

evidences.name: Valerie's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Stabbed with a knife in the back. Died from blood loss between 4 and 5 PM.

evidences.name: Dusky Bridge Map
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Bridge located 40 feet above Eagle River. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Victim's Note
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Confidential police materials written by the victim. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: A photo of the trunk of Fawles's car. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Scarf
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Miles Edgeworth.
evidences.description1: Worn by the victim at the time of the incident. Found on Dusky Bridge.

evidences.name: Witness's Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Seems to have been taken by the witness. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Taken by the witness. Bridge unchanged for 5 years. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Camera
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Melissa Foster.
evidences.description1: Melissa Foster took the Witness's Photo with this. A small but powerful model.
evidences.description2: Melissa Foster took the Witness's Photo with this. Has a timer function.

evidences.name: Diamond
evidences.description1: A 2 million dollar gem. Used as ransom for Dahlia. Lost to Eagle River 5 years ago.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.obtained: One of my possessions.* (when playing as Wright)  → Received from Phoenix Wright.* (when playing as Edgeworth)
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.* (when playing as Wright)
evidences.description2: Received from Wright. He wasn't serious when he gave this to me... was he?* (when playing as Edgeworth)

evidences.name: Magatama
evidences.obtained: Received from Maya Fey.* (when playing as Wright)  → Received from Phoenix Wright.* (when playing as Edgeworth)
evidences.description1: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.* (when playing as Wright)
evidences.description2: Received from Wright. Something about reading people's hearts... What utter nonsense.* (when playing as Edgeworth)

evidences.name: Oh! Cult! New Year's Issue
evidences.description1: An occult magazine featuring Hazakura Temple. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Hazakura Temple Map
evidences.description1: Shows Hazakura Temple and the surrounding area. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Hanging Scroll
evidences.obtained: Found at the Inner Temple Training Hall.
evidences.description1: Shows Misty Fey, Master of the Kurain Technique. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Misty Fey's image is obscured by gravy. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Photo of Elise
evidences.description1: Taken by her only pupil, Laurice Deauxnim. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Iris's Hood
evidences.description1: A magical hood said to offer protection from evil spirits.
evidences.description2: Received before the lights out bell the night of the crime. Protects from evil spirits.

evidences.name: Weather Data
evidences.description1: A regional weather report for the night of the crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Note to Iris
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Main Hall.
evidences.description1: Found in the Main Hall. Maybe she dropped it? Click here for details.

evidences.name: Victim's Staff
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Courtyard.
evidences.description1: Carried by Elise Deauxnim when she was alive. Has her fingerprints on it.
evidences.description2: Has a sword hidden inside. No one knows this except Detective Gumshoe and I.
evidences.description3: Has a sword hidden inside. The actual weapon used to murder the victim.

evidences.name: Shichishito
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Courtyard.
evidences.description1: The apparent murder weapon. Had the victim's blood and the suspect's fingerprints on it.
evidences.description2: Had the victim's blood and the suspect's fingerprints on it, but is not the murder weapon.

evidences.name: Elise's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Time: 10 - 11 PM. Cause: loss of blood from stab in back. Body fell 10 ft. after death.

evidences.name: Iris's Testimony
evidences.description1: Rang lights out bell at 10 PM and was then in her room until the murder was discovered.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: The courtyard where Elise Deauxnim was murdered. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Tracks Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: Taken that night. From Main Gate to Dusky Bridge. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Larry's Sketch
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Larry Butz.
evidences.description1: Horrible sketch of what he saw the night of the crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Crystal Sphere
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Larry Butz.
evidences.description1: Found half-covered in snow near Dusky Bridge the night of the crime. Has blood on it.
evidences.description2: Found on outcropping near Dusky Bridge. Has blood on it. Came from the victim's staff.

evidences.name: Kurain Master's Talisman
evidences.obtained: Found in the Inner Temple Garden.
evidences.description1: Worn by Elise Deauxnim. Found in the garden of the Inner Temple.

evidences.name: Burnt Letter
evidences.description1: Found by Gumshoe in the Inner Temple incinerator. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Orders from Morgan Fey. Opened once before. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Dagger
evidences.description1: Found behind a tree in the Inner Temple garden. The blood is being analyzed now.
evidences.description2: Found stuck in a pine tree in Inner Temple Garden. The blood doesn't match the victim's.

evidences.name: Stone Lantern
evidences.description1: A lantern from the Inner Temple garden. Was not lit the night of the crime.

evidences.name: Dusky Bridge Photo
evidences.description1: Taken the morning after the crime. Click here for details.
